attributes.action: IMMIGRANTS WHO DO CRIME TO BE DEPORTED
attributes.additional_details: if an immigrant choose's to do a crime they should be trialed then deported to place of origin as we have to keep immigration down aswell as our crime rate then we can work on the british peoples punishment more effictivly,and we will also be creating more jobs and less benifet payouts, america and australia are strict on immigrants we should be too.
